67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2685.content: Embed a PDF editor on your website and turn any PDF into a fillable form. The free plan allows unlimited PDFs with three submissions per PDF.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2686.title: forms.app
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2686.content: Create online forms with powerful features like conditional logic, automatic score calculator, and AI. Collect up to 100 responses with a free plan, embed your forms on a website, or use them with a link.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2687.title: Qualli
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2687.content: In App Surveys, designed for mobile. Use Qualli AI to craft the perfect questions. You can try it out on our free plan, up to 500 MAU, create unlimited forms and triggers.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2688.title: Sprig
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2688.content: 1 In-Product Survey or Survey with Replay per month, with GPT-powered AI Analysis.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2689.title: feedback.fish
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2689.content: Free plan allows collecting 25 total feedback submissions. Easy to integrate with React and Vue components provided.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268a.title: Vidhook
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268a.content: Collect feedback using delightful surveys with high response rates. Free plan includes 1 active survey, 25 responses per survey and customizable templates.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268b.title: Keywords AI
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268b.content: The best LLM monitoring platform. One format to call 200+ LLMs with 2 lines of code. 10,000 free requests every month and $0 for platform features!

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268c.title: Portkey
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268c.content: Control panel for Gen AI apps featuring an observability suite & an AI gateway. Send & log up to 10,000 requests for free every month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268d.title: Braintrust
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268d.content: Evals, prompt playground, and data management for Gen AI. Free plan gives upto 1,000 private eval rows/week.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268e.title: Findr
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268e.content: Universal search that lets you search all your apps, at once. Search assistant that lets you answer questions using your information. Free plan offers unlimited unified search and 5 co daily co pilot queries.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268f.title: ReportGPT
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c268f.content: AI Powered Writing Assistant. The entire platform is free as long as you bring your own API key.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2690.title: Clair
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2690.content: Clinical AI Reference. Students have free access to the professional tool suite, which includes Open Search, Clinical Summary, Med Review, Drug Interactions, ICD-10 Codes, and Stewardship. Additionally, a free trial for the professional suite is available.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2691.title: Langtrace
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2691.content: enables developers to trace, evaluate, manage prompts and datasets, and debug issues related to an LLM application's performance. It creates open telemetry standard traces for any LLM which helps with observability and works with any observability client. Free plan offers 50K traces/month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2692.title: LangWatch
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2692.content: A LLMOps platform helping AI teams measure, monitor, and optimize LLM applications for reliability, cost-efficiency, and performance. With a powerful DSPy component, we enable seamless collaboration between engineers and non-technical teams to fine-tune and productionize GenAI products. Free plan includes all platform features, 1k traces/month and 1 workflow DSPy optimizers. [#opensource](https://github.com/langwatch/langwatch)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2693.title: Ultra AI
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2693.content: AI command center for your product. Features include multi-provider AI gateway, prompts manager, caching, logs, analytics, model fallbacks and user rate limiting. Free forever plan offers 10k+ requests per month and all the features except caching.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2694.title: Comet Opik
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2694.content: Evaluate, test, and ship LLM applications across your dev and production lifecycles. [#opensource](https://github.com/comet-ml/opik/)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2695.title: Langfuse
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2695.content: Open-source LLM engineering platform that helps teams collaboratively debug, analyze, and iterate on their LLM applications. Free forever plan includes 50k observations per month and all platform features. [#opensource](https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2696.title: Pollinations.AI
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2696.content: easy-to-use, free image generation AI with free API available. No signups or API keys required, and several option for integrating into a website or workflow. [#opensource](https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2697.title: Othor AI
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2697.content: An AI-native fast, simple, and secure alternative to popular business intelligence solutions like Tableau, Power BI, and Looker. Othor utilizes large language models (LLMs) to deliver custom business intelligence solutions in minutes. The Free Forever plan provides one workspace with five datasource connections for one user, with no limits on analytics. [#opensource](https://github.com/othorai/othor.ai)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2698.title: OpenRouter
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2698.content: Provides various free AI models including DeepSeek R1, V3, Llama, and Moonshot AI. These models excel in natural language processing and are suitable for diverse development needs. Note that while these models are free to use, they are subject to rate limits. Additionally, OpenRouter offers paid models for more advanced requirements, for instance Claude, OpenAI, Grok, Gemini, and Nova.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2699.title: bootstrapcdn.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2699.content: CDN for bootstrap, bootswatch and fontawesome.io

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269a.title: cdnjs.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269a.content: Simple. Fast. Reliable. Content delivery at its finest. cdnjs is a free and open-source CDN service trusted by over 11% of all websites, powered by Cloudflare.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269b.title: developers.google.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269b.content: The Google Hosted Libraries is a content distribution network for the most popular Open Source JavaScript libraries

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269c.title: Stellate
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269c.content: Stellate is a blazing-fast, reliable CDN for your GraphQL API and free for two services.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269d.title: jsdelivr.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269d.content: A free, fast, and reliable open-source CDN. Supports npm, GitHub, WordPress, Deno, and more.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269e.title: Microsoft Ajax
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269e.content: The Microsoft Ajax CDN hosts popular third-party JavaScript libraries such as jQuery and enables you to easily add them to your Web application

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269f.title: ovh.ie
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c269f.content: Free DDoS protection and SSL certificate

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a0.title: Skypack
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a0.content: The 100% Native ES Module JavaScript CDN. Free for 1 million requests per domain per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a1.title: raw.githack.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a1.content: A modern replacement of **rawgit.com** which simply hosts file using Cloudflare

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a2.title: section.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a2.content: A simple way to spin up and manage a complete Varnish Cache solution. Supposedly free forever for one site

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a3.title: statically.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a3.content: CDN for Git repos (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), WordPress-related assets, and images

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a4.title: toranproxy.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a4.content: Proxy for Packagist and GitHub. Never fail CD. Free for personal use, one developer, no support

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a6.title: weserv
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a6.content: An image cache & resize service. Manipulate images on the fly with a worldwide cache.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a9.title: CacheFly
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26a9.content: Up to 5 TB per month of Free CDN traffic, 19 Core PoPs , 1 Domain and Universal SSL.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26aa.title: anvil.works
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26aa.content: Web app development with nothing but Python. Free tier with unlimited apps and 30-second timeouts.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ab.title: appwrite
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ab.content: Unlimited projects with no project pausing (supports websockets) and authentication service. 1 Database, 3 Buckets, 5 Functions per project in free tier.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ac.title: configure.it
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ac.content: Mobile app development platform, free for two projects, limited features but no resource limits

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ad.title: codenameone.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ad.content: Open source, cross-platform, mobile app development toolchain for Java/Kotlin developers. Free for commercial use with an unlimited number of projects

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ae.title: deco.cx
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ae.content: Edge-native frontend platform with a visual CMS auto-generated from TypeScript code. Built-in A/B testing, content segmentation, and real-time analytics. Perfect for content-heavy and Enterprise e-commerce websites. Free up to 5k pageviews/month or open-source/personal projects.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26af.title: Deno Deploy
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26af.content: Distributed system that runs JavaScript, TypeScript, and WebAssembly at the edge worldwide. The free tier includes 100,000 requests per day and 100 GiB data transfers per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b1.title: encore.dev
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b1.content: Backend framework using static analysis to provide automatic infrastructure, boilerplate-free code, and more. Includes free cloud hosting for hobby projects.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b2.title: flightcontrol.dev
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b2.content: Deploy web services, databases, and more on your own AWS account with a Git push style workflow. Free tier for users with 1 developer on personal GitHub repos. AWS costs are billed through AWS, but you can use credits and the AWS free tier.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b3.title: gigalixir.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b3.content: Gigalixir provides one free instance that never sleeps and a free-tier PostgreSQL database limited to 2 connections, 10, 000 rows and no backups for Elixir/Phoenix apps.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b4.title: Glitch
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b4.content: Free public hosting with code sharing and real-time collaboration features. The free plan has a 1000-hours/month limit.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b5.title: Lade
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b5.content: Lade is a cloud platform built for developers. The free tier includes three services, which can be either apps or databases. Each service includes 128 MB RAM and 1 GB storage.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b6.title: pipedream.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b6.content: An integration platform built for developers. Develop any workflow based on any trigger. Workflows are code you can run [for free](https://docs.pipedream.com/pricing/). No server or cloud resources to manage.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b7.title: pythonanywhere.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b7.content: Cloud Python app hosting. Beginner account is free, 1 Python web application at your-username.pythonanywhere.com domain, 512 MB private file storage, one MySQL database

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b8.title: ampt.dev
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b8.content: Ampt lets teams build, deploy, and scale JavaScript apps on AWS without complicated configs or managing infrastructure. Free Preview plan includes 500 invocations hourly, 2,500 invocations daily and 50,000 invocations monthly. Custom domains are allowed only in the paid plans.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b9.title: Koyeb
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26b9.content: Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 512MB memory, 2GB storage, and 0.1 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ba.title: Napkin
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ba.content: FaaS with 500Mb of memory, a default timeout of 15 seconds, and 5,000 free API calls/month rate-limited to 5 calls/second.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bb.title: Meteor Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bb.content: Galaxy hosting. Meteor's platform-as-a-service for Meteor apps includes free MongoDB Shared Hosting and automatic SSL.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bc.title: Northflank
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bc.content: Build and deploy microservices, jobs, and managed databases with a powerful UI, API & CLI. Seamlessly scale containers from version control and external Docker registries. The free tier includes two services, two cron jobs and 1 database.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bd.title: YepCode
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bd.content: All-in-one platform to connect APIs and services in a serverless environment. It brings all the agility and benefits of NoCode tools but with all the power of using programming languages. The free tier includes [1.000 yeps](https://yepcode.io/pricing/).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26be.title: WunderGraph
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26be.content: An open-source platform that allows you to  quickly build, ship and manage modern APIs. Built-in CI/CD, GitHub integration, and automatic HTTPS. Up to 3 projects, 1GB egress, 300 minutes of build time per month on the [free plan](https://wundergraph.com/pricing)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bf.title: Zeabur
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26bf.content: Deploy your services with one click. Free for three services, with US$ 5 free credits per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c0.title: mogenius
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c0.content: Easily build, deploy, and run services on Kubernetes. The free tier supports connecting a local Kubernetes with mogenius, enabling individual developers to create a production-like test environment on their machine.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c1.title: genezio
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c1.content: A serverless function provider offers 1 million function calls, 100GB of bandwidth, and 10 cron jobs per month for free, exclusively for non-commercial or academic use.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c2.title: Activepieces
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c2.content: Build automation flows to connect several apps together in your app's backend. For example, send a Slack message or add a Google Sheet row when an event fires in your app. Free up to 5,000 tasks per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c3.title: back4app.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c3.content: Back4App is an easy-to-use, flexible and scalable backend based on Parse Platform.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c4.title: backendless.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c4.content: Mobile and Web Baas, with 1 GB file storage free, push notifications of 50,000/month, and 1000 data objects in the table.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c5.title: bismuth.cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c5.content: Our AI will boostrap your Python API on our function runtime and hosted storage, build and host for free in our online editor or locally with your favorite tools.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c6.title: BMC Developer Program
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c6.content: The BMC Developer Program provides documentation and resources to build and deploy digital innovations for your enterprise. Access to a comprehensive, personal sandbox that includes the platform, SDK, and a library of components that can be used to build and tailor apps.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c7.title: connectycube.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c7.content: Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 1000 users.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c8.title: convex.dev
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c8.content: Reactive backend as a service, hosting your data (documents with relationships & serializable ACID transactions), serverless functions, and WebSockets to stream updates to various clients. Free for small projects - up to 1M records, 5M monthly function calls.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c9.title: darklang.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26c9.content: Hosted language combined with editor and infrastructure. Accessible during the beta, a generous free tier is planned after beta.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ca.title: Firebase
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ca.content: Firebase helps you build and run successful apps. Free Spark Plan offers Authentication, Hosting, Firebase ML, Realtime Database, Cloud Storage, Testlab. A/B Testing, Analytics, App Distribution, App Indexing, Cloud Messaging (FCM), Crashlytics, Dynamic Links, In-App Messaging, Performance Monitoring, Predictions, and Remote Config are always free.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cb.title: Flutter Flow
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cb.content: Build your Flutter App UI without writing a single line of code. Also has a Firebase integration. The free plan includes full access to UI Builder and Free templates.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cc.title: getstream.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cc.content: Build scalable In-App Chat, Messaging, Video and audio, and Feeds in a few hours instead of weeks

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cd.title: hasura.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cd.content: Hasura extends your existing databases wherever it is hosted and provides an instant GraphQL API that can be securely accessed for web, mobile, and data integration workloads. Free for 1GB/month of data pass-through.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ce.title: iron.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ce.content: Async task processing (like AWS Lambda) with free tier and 1-month free trial

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cf.title: nhost.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26cf.content: Serverless backend for web and mobile apps. The free plan includes PostgreSQL, GraphQL (Hasura), Authentication, Storage, and Serverless Functions.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d0.title: onesignal.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d0.content: Unlimited free push notifications. 10,000 email sends per month, with unlimited contacts and access to Auto Warm Up.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d1.title: paraio.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d1.content: Backend service API with flexible authentication, full-text search and caching. Free for one app, 1GB of app data.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d2.title: progress.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d2.content: Mobile backend, starter plan has unlimited requests/second, with 1 GB of data storage. Enterprise application support

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d3.title: pubnub.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d3.content: Free push notifications for up to 1 million messages/month and 100 active daily devices

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d4.title: pushbots.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d4.content: Push notification service. Free for up to 1.5 million pushes/month

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d5.title: pushcrew.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d5.content: Push notification service. Unlimited notifications for up to 2,000 Subscribers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d6.title: pusher.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d6.content: Free, unlimited push notifications for 2000 monthly active users. A single API for iOS and Android devices.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d7.title: quickblox.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d7.content: A communication backend for instant messaging, video, and voice calling, and push notifications

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d8.title: restspace.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d8.content: Configure a server with services for auth, data, files, email API, templates, and more, then compose into pipelines and transform data.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d9.title: Salesforce Developer Program
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26d9.content: Build apps Lightning fast with drag-and-drop tools. Customize your data model with clicks. Go further with Apex code. Integrate with anything using powerful APIs. Stay protected with enterprise-grade security. Customize UI with clicks or any leading-edge web framework. Free Developer Program gives access to the full Lightning Platform.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26da.title: ServiceNow Developer Program
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26da.content: Rapidly build, test, and deploy applications that make work better for your organization. Free Instance & access to early previews.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26db.title: simperium.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26db.content: Move data everywhere instantly and automatically, multi-platform, unlimited sending and storage of structured data, max. 2,500 users/month

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26dc.title: Singlebase.cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26dc.content: SinglebaseCloud is an AI-powered all-in-one backend platform to accelerate app development. It offers tools like Vector DB, Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, and Storage, aiming to simplify backend development. Free/Starter Plan offers Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, Storage.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26dd.title: stackstorm.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26dd.content: Event-driven automation for apps, services, and workflows, free without flow, access control, LDAP

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26de.title: streamdata.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26de.content: Turns any REST API into an event-driven streaming API. Free plan up to 1 million messages and ten concurrent connections.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26df.title: Supabase
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26df.content: The Open Source Firebase Alternative to build backends. Free Plan offers Authentication, Realtime Database & Object Storage.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e0.title: tyk.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e0.content: API management with authentication, quotas, monitoring and analytics. Free cloud offering

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e1.title: zapier.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e1.content: Connect the apps you use to automate tasks. Five zaps every 15 minutes and 100 tasks/month

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e2.title: IFTTT
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e2.content: Automate your favorite apps and devices. Free 2 Applets

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e3.title: Integrately
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e3.content: Automate tedious tasks with a single click. Free 100 Tasks, 15 Minute

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e4.title: LeanCloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e4.content: Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, and 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e5.title: Clappia
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e5.content: A low-code platform designed for building business process applications with customizable mobile and web apps. Offers a drag-and-drop interface, features like Offline Support, real-time location tracking and integration with various third-party services.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e6.title: Basedash
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e6.content: Low-code platform for building internal admin panels and dashboards. Supports SQL databases and REST APIs.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e7.title: BudiBase
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e7.content: Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e8.title: appsmith
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e8.content: Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e9.title: ToolJet
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26e9.content: Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc., and build apps using drag-and-drop application builder.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ea.title: ReTool
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ea.content: Low-code platform for building internal applications. Retool is highly hackable. If you can write it with JavaScript and an API, you can make it in Retool. The free tier allows up to five users per month, unlimited apps and API connections.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26eb.title: DronaHQ
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26eb.content: DronaHQ - a low code platform that helps engineering teams and product managers to build internal tools, custom user journeys, digital experiences, automation, custom admin panels, operational apps 10X faster.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ec.title: ILLA Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ec.content: ILLA Cloud - A robust open-source low-code platform for developers to build internal tools. By using ILLA's library of Components and Actions, developers can save massive amounts of time on building tools. Free for 5 team members.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ed.title: outsystems.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ed.content: Enterprise web development PaaS for on-premise or cloud, free "personal environment" offering allows for unlimited code and up to 1 GB database

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ee.title: UI Bakery
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ee.content: Low-code platform that enables faster building of custom web applications. Supports building UI using drag and drop with a high level of customization through JavaScript, Python, and SQL. Available as both cloud and self-hosted solutions. Free for up to 5 users.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ef.title: Mendix
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ef.content: Rapid Application Development for Enterprises, unlimited accessible sandbox environments supporting total users, 0.5 GB storage and 1 GB RAM per app. Also, Studio and Studio Pro IDEs are allowed in the free tier.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f0.title: lil'bots
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f0.content: write and run scripts online utlizing free built-in APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic, Firecrawl and others. Great for building AI agents / internal tooling and sharing with team. Free-tier includes full access to APIs, AI coding assistant and 10,000 execution credits / month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f1.title: Alwaysdata
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f1.content: 100 MB free web hosting with support for MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, MongoDB, PHP, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Java, Deno, custom web servers, access via FTP, WebDAV and SSH; mailbox, mailing list and app installer included.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f2.title: Awardspace.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f2.content: Free web hosting + a free short domain, PHP, MySQL, App Installer, Email Sending & No Ads.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f3.title: Bohr
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f3.content: Free for non commercial projects + Developer-First Deployment and Development Platform that minimizes infrastructure hassle and speed up setup.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f4.title: Bubble
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f4.content: Visual programming to build web and mobile apps without code, free with Bubble branding.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f5.title: dAppling Network
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f5.content: Decentralized web hosting platform for Web3 frontends focusing on increasing uptime and security and providing an additional access point for users.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f6.title: DigitalOcean
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f6.content: Build and deploy three static sites for free on the App Platform Starter tier.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f7.title: Drive To Web
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f7.content: Host directly to the web from Google Drive & OneDrive. Static sites only. Free forever. One site per Google/Microsoft account.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f8.title: Fenix Web Server
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f8.content: A developer desktop app for hosting sites locally and sharing them publically (in real-time). Work however you like, using its beautiful user interface, API, and/or CLI.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f9.title: Fern
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26f9.content: Build and host a Markdown-based documentation site on Fern's free plan. You can even auto-generate an API reference for your site from API definition files. The site is hosted at _yoursite_.docs.buildwithfern.com.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fa.title: Free Hosting
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fa.content: Free Hosting With PHP 5, Perl, CGI, MySQL, FTP, File Manager, POP E-Mail, free sub-domains, free domain hosting, DNS Zone Editor, Web Site Statistics, FREE Online Support and many more features not offered by other free hosts.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fb.title: Freehostia
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fb.content: FreeHostia offers free hosting services incl. an industry-best Control Panel & a 1-click installation of 50+ free apps. Instant setup. No forced ads.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fc.title: HelioHost
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fc.content: Non-profit free web hosting with Plesk control panel, PHP, Node.js, Python, Django, Flask, .NET, Perl, CGI, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, IMAP/POP3/SMTP email, unlimited bandwidth, free subdomains, 1000 MB storage for free with the option to upgrade.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fd.title: Kinsta Static Site Hosting
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fd.content: Deploy up to 100 static sites for free, custom domains with SSL, 100 GB monthly bandwidth, 260+ Cloudflare CDN locations.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fe.title: Lecturify
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26fe.content: Web hosting with SFPT access for file upload and download, php available.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ff.title: Neocities
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c26ff.content: Static, 1 GB free storage with 200 GB Bandwidth.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2700.title: Netlify
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2700.content: Builds, deploys and hosts static site/app free for 100 GB data and 100 GB/month bandwidth.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2701.title: pantheon.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2701.content: Drupal and WordPress hosting, automated DevOps, and scalable infrastructure. Free for developers and agencies. No custom domain.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2702.title: readthedocs.org
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2702.content: Free documentation hosting with versioning, PDF generation, and more

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2703.title: render.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2703.content: Unified cloud to build and run apps and sites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks, auto-deploys from Git, and completely free plans for web services, databases, and static web pages.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2704.title: SourceForge
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2704.content: Find, Create, and Publish Open Source software for free

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2705.title: surge.sh
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2705.content: Static web publishing for Front-End developers. Unlimited sites with custom domain support

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2707.title: tilda.cc
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2707.content: One site, 50 pages, 50 MB storage, only the main pre-defined blocks among 170+ available, no fonts, no favicon, and no custom domain

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2708.title: Vercel
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2708.content: Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2709.title: Versoly
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2709.content: SaaS-focused website builder - unlimited websites, 70+ blocks, five templates, custom CSS, favicon, SEO and forms. No custom domain.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270a.title: Qoddi
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270a.content: PaaS service similar to Heroku with a developer-centric approach and all-inclusive features. Free tier for static assets, staging, and developer apps.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270b.title: FreeFlarum
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270b.content: Community-powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove the watermark from the footer).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270c.title: fleek.co
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270c.content: Build modern sites and apps on the Open Web and its protocols seamlessly free for unlimited websites and 50 GB/month bandwidth.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270d.title: MDB GO
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270d.content: Free hosting for one project with two weeks Container TTL, 500 MB RAM per project, SFTP - 1G disk space.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270e.title: Patr Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270e.content: An easy-to-use cloud platform, among its paid services it offers to host three static sites for free.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270f.title: Serv00.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c270f.content: 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2710.content: Free public DNS Resolver, which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by Cloudflare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). It can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2711.title: 1984.is
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2711.content: Free DNS service with API and lots of other free DNS features included.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2712.title: cloudns.net
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2712.content: Free DNS hosting up to 1 domain with 50 records

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2713.title: deSEC
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2713.content: Free DNS hosting with API support, designed with security in mind. Runs on open-source software and is supported by [SSE](https://www.securesystems.de/).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2714.title: dns.he.net
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2714.content: Free DNS hosting service with Dynamic DNS Support

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2715.title: Zonomi
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2715.content: Free DNS hosting service with instant DNS propagation. Free plan: 1 DNS zone (domain name) with up to 10 DNS records.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2717.title: duckdns.org
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2717.content: Free DDNS with up to 5 domains on the free tier. With configuration guides for various setups.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2718.title: Dynv6.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2718.content: Free DDNS service with [API support](https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2719.title: freedns.afraid.org
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2719.content: Free DNS hosting. Also, provide free subdomains based on numerous public user [contributed domains](https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/). Get free subdomains from the "Subdomains" menu after signing up.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271a.title: luadns.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271a.content: Free DNS hosting, three domains, all features with reasonable limits

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271b.title: namecheap.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271b.content: Free DNS. No limit on the number of domains

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271d.title: noip.at
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271d.content: Free DDNS service without registration, tracking, logging or advertising. No limit to domains.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271e.title: noip
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271e.content: a dynamic DNS service that allows up to 3 hostnames free with confirmation every 30 days

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271f.title: sslip.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c271f.content: Free DNS service that when queried with a hostname with an embedded IP address returns that IP address.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2721.title: zoneedit.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2721.content: Free DNS hosting with Dynamic DNS Support.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2722.title: zonewatcher.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2722.content: Automatic backups and DNS change monitoring. One domain free

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2726.title: eu.org
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2726.content: Free eu.org domain. The request is usually approved in 14 days.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2729.title: 4EVERLAND
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2729.content: Compatible with AWS S3 - APIs, interface operations, CLI, and other upload methods, upload and store files from the IPFS and Arweave networks in a safe, convenient, and efficient manner. Registered users can get 6 GB of IPFS storage and 300MB of Arweave storage for free. Any Arweave file uploads smaller than 150 KB are free.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272a.title: backblaze.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272a.content: Backblaze B2 cloud storage. Free 10 GB (Amazon S3-like) object storage for unlimited time

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272b.title: filebase.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272b.content: S3 Compatible Object Storage Powered by Blockchain. 5 GB free storage for an unlimited duration.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272c.title: Tebi
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272c.content: S3 compatibility object storage.Free 25 GB storage and 250GB outbound transfer.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272d.title: Idrive e2
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272d.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 10 GB free storage and 10 GB download bandwidth per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272e.title: C2 Object Storage
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272e.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 15 GB free storage and 15 GB downloads per month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272f.title: Aiven
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c272f.content: Aiven offers free PostgreSQL, MySQL and Redis plans on its open-source data platform. Single node, 1 CPU, 1GB RAM, and for PostgreSQL and MySQL, 5GB storage. Easy migration to more extensive plans or across clouds.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2730.title: airtable.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2730.content: Looks like a spreadsheet, but it's a relational database unlimited bases, 1,200 rows/base, and 1,000 API requests/month

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2731.title: Astra
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2731.content: Cloud Native Cassandra as a Service with [80GB free tier](https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-astra/pricing)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2732.title: codehooks.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2732.content: Easy to use JavaScript serverless API/backend and NoSQL database service with functions, Mongdb-ish queries, key/value lookups, a job system, realtime messages, worker queues, a powerful CLI and a web-based data manager. Free plan has 5GB storage and 60/API calls per minute. 2 developers included. No credit-card required.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2733.title: CrateDB
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2733.content: Distributed Open Source SQL database for real-time analytics. [Free Tier CRFREE](https://crate.io/lp-crfree): One-node with 2 CPUs, 2 GiB of memory, 8 GiB of storage. One cluster per organization, no payment method needed.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2734.title: FaunaDB
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2734.content: Serverless cloud database with native GraphQL, multi-model access, and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2735.title: Upstash
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2735.content: Serverless Redis with free tier up to 10,000 requests per day, 256MB max database size, and 20 concurrent connections

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2737.title: redsmin.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2737.content: Online real-time monitoring and administration service for Redis, Monitoring for 1 Redis instance free

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2739.title: MemCachier
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2739.content: Managed Memcache service. Free for up to 25MB, 1 Proxy Server, and basic analytics

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273a.title: scalingo.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273a.content: Primarily a PaaS but offers a 128MB to 192MB free tier of MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273b.title: SeaTable
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273b.content: Flexible, Spreadsheet-like Database built by the Seafile team. unlimited tables, 2,000 lines, 1-month versioning, up to 25 team members.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273c.title: skyvia.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273c.content: Cloud Data Platform offers a free tier and all plans are completely free while in beta

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273d.title: StackBy
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273d.content: One tool that combines spreadsheets' flexibility, databases' power, and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. The free plan includes unlimited users, ten stacks, and a 2GB attachment per stack.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273e.title: TiDB Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273e.content: TiDB is an open-source MySQL-compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Serverless provides 5GB of row storage, 5GB of column storage, and 50 million Request Units (RUs) for free each month.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273f.title: Turso by ChiselStrike
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c273f.content: Turso is SQLite Developer Experience in an Edge Database. Turso provides a Free Forever starter plan, 9 GB of total storage, Up to 500 databases, Up to 3 locations, 1 billion row reads per month, and Local development support with SQLite.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2740.title: InfluxDB
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2740.content: Timeseries database, free up to 3MB/5 minutes writes, 30MB/5 minutes reads and 10,000 cardinalities series

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2741.title: restdb.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2741.content: a fast and straightforward NoSQL cloud database service. With restdb.io you get schema, relations, automatic REST API (with MongoDB-like queries), and an efficient multi-user admin UI for working with data. The free plan allows 3 users, 2500 records, and 1 API request per second.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2743.title: Neo4j Aura
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2743.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2744.title: Neon
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2744.content: Managed PostgreSQL, 0.5 GB of storage (total), 1 Project ,10 branches, Unlimited Databases, always-available primary branch ( Auto suspend after 5 minutes), 20 hours of Active time per month (total) for non-primary branch compute.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2745.title: Dgraph Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2745.content: Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data transfer per day.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2746.title: Tinybird
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2746.content: A serverless managed ClickHouse with connection-less data ingest over HTTP and lets you publish SQL queries as managed HTTP APIs. There is no time limit on free-tier, 10GB storage + 1000 API requests per day.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2747.title: TigerGraph Cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2747.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. One free instance with two vCPU, 8GB Memory, and 50GB storage that sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2748.title: TerminusCMS
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2748.content: Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2749.title: filess.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2749.content: filess.io is a platform where you can create two databases with up to 10 MB per database of the following DBMS for free: MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274a.title: xata.io
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274a.content: Xata is a serverless database with built-in powerful search and analytics. One API, multiple type-safe client libraries, and optimized for your development workflow. The free-forever tier is sufficient for hobby developers which comes with three units of Xata, please refer to the website for unit definition.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274b.title: 8base.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274b.content: 8base is a full-stack low-code development platform built for JavaScript developers built on top of MySQL and GraphQL and serverless backend-as-a-service. It allows you to start building web applications quickly using a UI app builder and scale quickly, The Free tier includes rows: 2,500, Storage: 500, Serverless computing: 1Gb/h, and client app users: 5.

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274c.title: Nile
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274c.content: A Postgres platform for B2B apps. Unlimited databases, Always available with no shutdown, 1GB of storage (total), 50 million query tokens, autoscaling, unlimited vector embeddings

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274d.title: Pinggy
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274d.content: Public URLs for localhost with a single command, no downloads required. HTTPS / TCP / TLS tunnels. The free plan has 60 minutes tunnel lifetime.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274d.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274e.title: conveyor.cloud
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274e.content: Visual Studio extension to expose IIS Express to the local network or over a tunnel to a public URL.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274e.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274f.title: Hamachi
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274f.content: LogMeIn Hamachi is a hosted VPN service that lets you securely extend LAN-like networks to distributed teams with a free plan that allows unlimited networks with up to 5 people
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c274f.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2750.title: Mirna Sockets
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2750.content: Free Socket as a Service Platform that gives you a wss:// URL when deploying your Web Socket Server code and also allows you to monitor its performance.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2750.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2752.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2753.title: ngrok.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2753.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2753.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2754.title: cname.dev
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2754.content: Free and secure dynamic reverse proxy service.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2754.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2755.title: serveo
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2755.content: Expose local servers to the internet. No installation, no signup. Free subdomain, no limits.
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2755.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2756.title: Radmin VPN
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2756.content: Connect multiple computers together via a VPN-enabling LAN-like network. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative)

67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2757.title: segment.com
67e7f2d0a50bd19d563c2757.content: Hub to translate and route events to other third-party services. 100,000 events/month free
